channel.title: Tools on Vithurshan SELVARAJAH
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Vithurshan SELVARAJAH

item.title: Pentester's Toolbox
item.description: Web Enumeration Feroxbuster Search for web pages with .js and .htlm extension and the default wordlist will be used: feroxbuster -u http://127.0.0.1 -x js,html DONE Wfuzz Wfuzz will replace the placeholder in the provided URL with the words from the wordlist. Whatweb Identify the technology stack has been used to build the website: whatweb http://192.168.5.244 WPScan WPScan WordPress security scanner. Enumerate WordPress plugins vulnerabilities by providing an API key: wpscan --enumerate vp --plugins-detection aggressive --url http://atomicl.
